mapper.insert: insert into member (email, member_id, nickname, password, reg_date, status) values (#{email},#{member_id},#{nickname},#{password},CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,0)
mapper.select: select * from member where member_id = #{member_id} and password = #{password} and status = 0
select member_id from member where email = #{email} and status=0
select password from member where member_id = #{member_id} and email = #{email} and status=0
